description:
TaskInfo is a poweful utility that combines and improves features of Task Manager and System Information tools. It visually monitors (in text and graphical forms) different types of system information in any Windows system in real time.

**NOTE**: Taskinfo is free for non-commercial use. To activate it, in registration menu click the "Free for personal non-commercial use or use parameter /Register: `choco install taskinfo /packageParameters /Register`

![screenshot](https://cdn.rawgit.com/majkinetor/chocolatey/master/taskinfo/screenshot.gif)
summary: TaskInfo is a poweful utility that combines and improves features of Task Manager and System Information tools
author: Igor Arsenin
